original_title: Sean Gardner: Ex-coach at renowned US gymnastics academy is arrested by FBI years after abuse reports | CNN
article_summary: Suspended gymnastics coach Sean Gardner, accused of sexually abusing young gymnasts and secretly recording them, was arrested on a federal child pornography charge in 2025. Despite being suspended from coaching by SafeSport in 2018, Gardner was able to work at an Iowa hospital in 2024, and the investigation into his case has been ongoing for years. The gym where he worked, Chow's Gymnastics & Dance Institute, is known for training Olympic champions.</s>
